effect.sun_moon: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.sun_moon: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user’s party.
